name: 2018-the 8th International Workshop on Computer Science and Engineering WCSE
content: Conference official website:http://www.wcse.us/ Meeting time：June 28-30, 2018 Meeting place：1880 New Petchburi Road, Bangkok 10310 Thailand/Science and Engineering Institute keynote speakers Prof. Xiangxian Chen, Zhejiang University, China Prof.Hayato Ohwada, Tokyo University of Science, Japan Published by：All accepted papers must be written in English and will be published into conference and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus after the conference. Paper Submission: 19-May.-2018 Call for papers: Earthquake engineering Architectural engineering Aerospace engineering Acoustical engineering Artificial intelligence Conference Contact: Ms. Shane X. Zeng mailbox: wcse\_general@zhconf.ac.cn Tel:+86-28-8652-8629
